meta.article_title: October 16, 2011 - You must attack those steady deep backspin serve returns

attack_steady_deep_backspin_returns.probleme: Slow, predictable backspin returns off the serve
causes_communes: Opponents pushing back deep any backspin serves

debutant: Start rallies with a serve and loop, forehand or backhand
Get good spin, loop the ball deep on the table, and vary placement to wide backhand, wide forehand, and opponent's elbow

exercices_complementaires.description: Cut off extreme angles; makes it difficult for receiver to attack serve
